评论详情: Great fit, true to size. Didn't shrink.

评论概述: Cute, comfortable, and true to size
评论详情: This t-shirt has a really cute design and is a comfortable cotton t-shirt. The color is pale pink that is slightly different from the picture, but I actually prefer this color more. Fits well and true to size.

What an adorable valentines day shirt! I grabbed this to wear to work. It is super cute and very soft to the feel. I would say it fits true to size, however, if you like an oversized t-shirt I would order up a size. The light pink color is great and still bright. The white design stands out nicely.
I like this shirt design, it is super cute and the sizing was right for me. Just order your usual size and it should be fine. Cotton t shirt, shaped for women. Is a nice addition to my wardrobe

This Valentine's Day shirt is a cute and casual option for the holiday. The heart print adds a touch of festive cheer, and the soft fabric is comfortable to wear. Perfect for a casual Valentine's Day outfit or as a gift for a loved one. It could also be worn at any time of the year.

评论概述: Runs a little small - and not exactly like the picture
评论详情: I like the Valentine-esque of the shirt -- can be worn in February of course, but also throughout the year.  The shirt isn't heathered at all - even though the photos might want you to think they are.  The shirt feels of substantial quality -- it has a nice weight to it.  Not thin and clingy, but not your beefy cotton tee -- think somewhere in the middle.  The sizing does appear a bit small -- but I wasn't quite sure what to expect as the size I ordered isn't listed on their chart -- so it was a gamble on my part.
The shirt is soft, comfortable, and fits perfectly. It looks very cute on and the color is a perfect, vibrant light pink color. The quality is great as well.
Really the cutest t-shirt. I got ping so it is less "valentine" and I can easier wear is all year long. Works great as a layer too.

I really like this shirt. Ordered the red heart design in a size small. It fits as expected. The material is soft and comfortable. The construction is good quality and the colors are bright and cheery. Washed up nicely with no issues.

I recently bought the Valentine's Day Shirts for Women Valentine Love Heart Printed Graphic T-shirt, and after wearing it for 6 weeks, I'm really impressed. The heart graphic is vibrant and cute, perfectly capturing the spirit of Valentine's Day. The fabric is soft and breathable, making it comfortable to wear all day. The fit is true to size, and after multiple washes, the shirt has held up well with no fading or shrinking. It's versatile enough to pair with jeans or skirts, making it a great choice for casual wear beyond just Valentine's Day. Overall, it's a fun, affordable addition to any wardrobe, perfect for celebrating love in style.
I love hearts and I love this t-shirt. It fits well.  It is a must have for anyone who love hearts.

Really pretty. I like that there are no words - only hearts. So you can wear it not only on Feb. 14. I got a size Large which is usually more loose on me. I like the fit, but it seems it runs on a smaller side so if you're considering between a M or a L maybe order up.

I laundered this super soft cotton blend t-shirt with a regular load of wash in warm water, dried it on low/normal and it popped out of the dryer wrinkle free with no shrinkage. My only regret is that I ordered up a size thinking it ran small. I'll need to order another one for myself & gift this one to my sister.

I love this shirt! It is vibrant red and super soft. I love the hearts! I know the listing says 'for Valentine's Day', but as there is no Valentine sentiment on the shirt, you can wear it whenever. Hearts have no season XD The big issue is the size. I ordered an XL but it only fits my daughter who is a size large. So she gets this one and now I'll have to find it a size larger for me.

评论概述: Nice cotton feel. Not the super super stretchy fabric.
评论详情: This shirt has that cotton feeling. Not the super stretchy kind which I love.

The light pink shirt is portrayed as being a heathered jersey cotton blend. Even the product listing says it's made of "cotton blend". This is not the case. It's a poly-blend of polyester, rayon, and spandex. The material is still comfortable though, as well as thin and breathable. The design appears to be a vinyl iron-on, so its durability is questionable.  I wear a Medium/Large and ordered the Large. It fits me just right (I'm 5'6", 136lbs). If you're in between sizes, definitely size up.

评论概述: Heart Printed Graphic T-shirt in Dark Pink
评论详情: I like this shirt.  It's soft and the design is simple.  I ordered the dark pink, which has a little bit of a heathered pink appearance that is pretty nice.  I ordered a size based on the size chart and it fits great.  Note, this is not my normal size, so you definitely want to check the size chart.  The fabric content is listed as being a cotton blend, but my shirt is 65% polyester, 30% rayon, and 5% spandex.  I know that sometimes cotton is blended with all of these materials, and maybe that's what this is, but it's a little confusing.  Also, the tag says they recommend professional dry cleaning.  I absolutely did not do that.  I machine washed and dried it without any problem.  The print on the front is an iron-on transfer, and not screen printed, so it will wear out quickly if washed often.  It is a nice shirt. It's comfortable to wear and it looks nice.
Picked this up for my wife who really likes the top.  It's a bright color pink. She is 5'6"...120 lbs and the small is a touch big on her however hopefully will shrink a bit once washed.  Nice tee!

I loved the picture of the light pink. The picture looked like a heathered color. The short was light pink, but not heathered. It looked more like a cotton candy pink. I was disappointed in the color. The short also runs a little small.

评论概述: Subdued print, soft, true to fit
评论详情: Live this shirt design;) Adorable. Soft and fits perfect to sizing. Simple. Flowy, lightweight
I did size up based on reviews. I usually wear a L and ordered a XL, fits great. Material is soft and has some stretch. Great color in person.

My wife loves this shirt. This women’s Valentine’s Day shirt, made from soft, breathable fabric, features a cute heart design. Perfect for Valentine’s dates, photos, or everyday wear, it pairs well with any outfit, making it a stylish gift for friends.
As pictured. Size up one for a loose fit. Well made.

This shirt is perfect for Valentine’s Day. For reference, I am 5 feet tall and weigh 120 pounds, and I ordered a small. The fit is ideal, and the material is of good quality. I washed and dried it, and it didn’t shrink, nor did it need ironing. Given the price, I highly recommend this T-shirt.

My wife was quite pleased with this T-shirt from the moment it arrived.  Although several reviewers have commented on the fact that it was not quite true-to-size for them, it was a perfect fit for my wife.  Despite the fact that  it is a little early for Valentine’s day, the graphics and the vibrant colors are definitely fine to wear throughout the year.  Last weekend, when wearing it out with a group of friends, my wife received several compliments on it.  For that matter, she noted that the material was “soft and comfy,” and unquestionably goes well with a pair of jeans.

I got this shirt for my wife.  It's intended as a Valentine's Day shirt but would actually be appropriate for any time of year since the design is not Valentine-specific, just hearts.  It fits almost perfectly.

评论概述: Adorable Everyday Tee Perfect Beyond Valentine’s Day
评论详情: Great t-shirt! It’s super cute, and the pink color looks exactly like it does in the photo.  I love the hearts design—it’s sweet and playful.  Who says it’s just for Valentine’s Day? I feel like I’m wrapped in love every time I wear it.For reference, I’m 5'7" and 128 lbs.  I prefer my t-shirts loose, so I ordered a large.  It fits nicely—relaxed without being overly big.  The material is very comfortable and breathes well, perfect for warmer days.  The only downside is that the fabric is quite thin, making it a bit see-through.  To avoid any exposure, I’d suggest wearing a tank top or nude-colored underwear underneath.

评论概述: Run small, not much stretch and thin
评论详情: This pink Valentine's-themed T-shirt with hearts is cute but has some fit and comfort issues. I ordered an XL for my mom, who's a size 16, and while it does fit, it’s tighter than she'd prefer, and the material has very little stretch. The fabric is also thin, so you can see skin tone underneath.

评论概述: No cotton despite description that says “cotton blend”
评论详情: Shirt feels terrible, like wearing plastic. The red color is bright and the design is cute but it doesn’t feel or look good. Also, a bit small in my opinion. Definitely returning and I do not recommend.
Cute t- shirt for Valentine’s Day - comfy, washed up nicely.
The color is vibrant, I love it, the only thing is. It runs small.

评论概述: Quality Shirt with Issues- Size Up, Not for Larger Busts, Dry Clean Recommended???
评论详情: I have mixed feelings about this Valentine's Day t-shirt. It is a nice looking shirt, soft, and well constructed. The print is appealing and expresses the holiday sentiment well, but can also be worn outside of the holiday. Unfortunately, the shirt runs very small. Regardless of the size, it is also not larger bust friendly. Even worse, the care tag states "Professional Dry Cleaning Recommended". For a t-shirt? I think not. That makes me think that this shirt will most likely shrink horribly in the dryer if home laundered. This would make the sizing situation even worse. In short, this shirt is not for me. Again, it is a quality product, but issues abound. With this information in mind, please make your own determination as to if it is appropriate and appealing to you.
This shirt is cute, soft and comfortable! Size is perfect and fits great! Perfect for valentines day!

I ordered a small and I like the fit, even though my suggested size for this particular shirt was medium. I think i probably could wear that as well. It's a cute design and a true red. I gave only 4 stars because I haven't washed it yet.
